mapper.select: SELECT mybook_no, fileurl, title, hit, nickname FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY my.mybook_no DESC) AS rn, my.mybook_no, f.fileurl, my.title, my.hit, m.nickname FROM mybook my, files f, member m WHERE my.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} AND f.BOOK_NO = my.MYBOOK_NO AND f.BOOK_TYPE like 'MYBOOK' AND f.FILETYPE like 'COVER' AND my.MEMBER_NO = m.member_no ) WHERE rn > #{cri.pageStart} AND ROWNUM <= #{cri.perPageNum}
